full_text: REE EE 5 ie IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2020/KER/813 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON WEDNESDAY, THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 18TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.8409 OF 2019 (A) CRIME NO.402/2019 OF Chittoor Police Station, Palakkad PETITIONERS /ACCUSED: 1 SHARATH R AGED 23 YEARS D/O.RAVEENDRAN, KURUVANNAMPALLAM HOUSE, THEKKEDASAM.P.O, NALLEPPILLY 2 AJITH A AGED 25 YEARS S/O.APPU, KURUVANNAMPALLAM, THEKKEDESAM.P.O, NALLEPPILLY 3 MANOJ M AGED 21 YEARS S/O.MADHAVAN, KURUVANNAMPALLAM, THEKKEDESAM.P.O, NALLEPPILLY 4 PRASAD S AGED 22 YEARS S/O.SREEDHARAN, ARANDAPPALLAM HOUSE, THEKKEDESAM.P.O, NALLEPPILLY 5 PRADEEP S AGED 21 YEARS S/O.SREEDHARAN, ARANDAPPALLAM HOUSE, THEKKEDESAM.P.O., NALLEPPILLY 6 GOKUL K AGED 23 YEARS S/O.KRISHNAN, KURUVANNAMPALLAM HOUSE, THEKKEDASAM.P.O, NALLEPPILLY BY ADVS. SRI .K.ANAND SRI.BENNY ANTONY PAREL SRI.T.M.MUHAMED HAFEES RESPONDENTS/STATE & DEFACTO COMPLAINANT: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF gaan REE cop 4 ie Crl1.MC.No.8409 OF 2019(A) 2020/KERBI3 2 KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682031 2 PRADEEP P AGED 25 YEARS S/O.PRABHAKARAN, PRABHA NIVAS, MEPPALLAM, NALLEPPILLY, CHITTOOR, PALAKKAD 3 SANTHOSH K AGED 26 YEARS S/O. KRISHNANKUTTY, MEPPALLAM HOUSE, NALLEPPILLY.P.O R2-3 BY ADV. N.RAJESH (PALAKKAD) OTHER PRESENT: SRI.C.S.HRITHWIK SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Balers Tal pea Crl.MC.No.8409 OF 2019(A) 2020/KERBI3 3 ORDER Dated this the 8th day of January, 2020 The petitioners are accused in Crime No.402/2019 of Chittoor Police Station, Palakkad for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 341, 323, 324 and 308 read with Section 149 of the IPC. The defacto complainant and injured are respondents 2 and 3. They have appeared through counsel and filed affidavits to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled and that they do not have any grievance against the petitioners. There is also a counter case registered against the respondents 2 and 3 and others as Crime No.403/2019 of the same Police Station which too has been settled. A report has been obtained from the Investigating Officer regarding the settlement. The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. There is no public interest involved. In the result, the Crl.M.C is allowed and the entire proceedings in Crime No.402/2019 of Chittoor Police Station stands quashed under Section 482 Cr.P.C and the accused are discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE NR/08/01/20 REE cop 4 ie Crl.MC.No.8409 OF 2019(A) 2020/KERBI3 4 APPENDIX PETITIONERS' EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE Al TRUE COPY OF THE FIR NO 402/2019 oF CHITTOOR POLICE STATION, PALAKKAD.
